title: Brand New OCE Streamer

embed.description: NEW STREAM!! | 1 Day Until Official Debut

body:
Hey guys, 

A mate of mine is giving streaming a go. Him and myself have spent a lot of time making his Twitch TV look decent and well.. pretty to look at. 

Come stop by if you have some spare time. Leave some feedback. We really want to know what you people think!

Peace Out! {{summoner:12}}
